original_text:
Cash Compass
Tra le tante slot uscita di recente, di sicuro Cash Compass è una di quelle che meritano un’attenzione particolare. Prodotta dalla Hacksaw Gaming, questa slot si ispira a una di quelle storie che da secoli affascinano le persone di tutto il mondo: i pirati e le isole deserte dei Caraibi. È proprio il mare cristallino e le palme lussureggianti che fanno da sfondo alla griglia di gioco, qui rappresentata da una pergamena inchiodata a una tavola di legno. I simboli ricordano i disegni dei cartoni animati e anche se la grafica non è eccelsa, questo non è un problema, anzi: meno pesante è il software, migliore è la fluidità del gioco! Sulla parte alta della griglia si trova il titolo della slot, dove la “o” di Compass è rappresentata dalla bussola con una funzione particolare durante uno dei vari giochi bonus presenti. Nella parte bassa trovate i tasti per accedere al menù e per attivare i giri automatici, oltre alle freccette che permettono di aumentare o diminuire la puntata.
Caratteristiche principali
La griglia ha 6 rulli e 6 righe e le combinazioni vincenti si ottengono con simboli uguali adiacenti. In tal senso le linee paganti si possono dipanare in orizzontale, in verticale, in diagonale, su linee spezzate. La vincita massima supera 7.400 volte la puntata ed è possibile attivare tra i 10 e i 1.000 giri automatici. La puntata minima è pari a 0,20 €, la massima a 100 €. L’RTP è abbastanza buono, pari al 96,42%.
Simboli e funzionalità
Come già detto, si vince se compaiono almeno sei simboli adiacenti. Quelli legati alle carte da gioco, J, Q, K e A sono quelli che pagano meno: con la puntata minima si va da 0,02 € per 6 simboli sino a un massimo di 2 € per 15 o più simboli. La mappa e lo scudo hanno un range di vittoria compreso tra 0,10 € e 12 €, l’ampolla e il pappagallo 0,20 € min. – 26 € max. e infine la bussola, il vero simbolo del gioco: 30 o più di questi simboli permettono di vincere 200 €! Se compaiono almeno 5 bussole, vedremo la bussola sul logo riempirsi progressivamente con delle linee rosse, dopodiché l’ago si muoverà fermandosi poi su un punto cardinale. A questo punto tutte le bussole si espanderanno seguendo la direzione indicata dall’ago! Le bottiglie hanno invece la funzione di Scatter e con almeno 3 si ottengono 10 giri gratuiti. Durante i Free Spins, ogni volta che appare una bussola sui rulli quella sul logo comincia a ruotare e appariranno altri simboli uguali. In base alla posizione in cui si ferma l’ago, tutti i simboli speciali si espanderanno.
Con 3 simboli Bonus si attiva un gioco speciale: la griglia viene sostituita da una ruota suddivisa in 8 sezioni con moltiplicatori 1X. Ogni volta che la ruota si ferma su un moltiplicatore, questo viene potenziato sino a 250X. Si hanno a disposizione 50 giri di ruota, a meno che l’ago non si fermi sul simbolo del teschio, in tal caso il gioco bonus si ferma e si torna a quello base.

raw_translation.response:
Cash Compass

Among the many new slot games, Cash Compass is certainly one that deserves special attention. Produced by Hacksaw Gaming, this slot is inspired by one of those stories that have fascinated people all over the world for centuries: pirates and the deserted islands of the Caribbean. The crystal clear sea and lush palms form the backdrop to the game grid, represented here by a parchment nailed to a wooden board. The symbols resemble cartoon drawings, and even though the graphics are not top-notch, this is not a problem. In fact, the lighter the software, the better the game's fluidity! The slot title is located at the top of the grid, where the "o" of Compass is represented by a compass with a special function during one of the various bonus games. At the bottom, you will find the buttons to access the menu and activate the automatic spins, as well as the arrows that allow you to increase or decrease the bet.

Main characteristics
The grid has 6 reels and 6 rows, and winning combinations are obtained with adjacent identical symbols. In this sense, the pay lines can unfold horizontally, vertically, diagonally, or on broken lines. The maximum win exceeds 7,400 times the bet, and it is possible to activate between 10 and 1,000 automatic spins. The minimum bet is €0.20, and the maximum is €100. The RTP is quite good, at 96.42%.

Symbols and features
As already mentioned, you win if at least six adjacent symbols appear. The ones related to playing cards (J, Q, K, and A) are the ones that pay the least: with the minimum bet, they range from €0.02 for 6 symbols up to a maximum of €2 for 15 or more symbols. The map and the shield have a winning range between €0.10 and €12, the bottle and the parrot have a range between €0.20 min. - €26 max., and finally the compass, the true symbol of the game: 30 or more of these symbols allow you to win €200! If at least 5 compasses appear, we will see the compass on the logo gradually fill up with red lines, after which the needle will move and then stop at a cardinal point. At this point, all the compasses will expand following the direction indicated by the needle! The bottles have the Scatter function, and with at least 3, you get 10 free spins. During the Free Spins, every time a compass appears on the reels, the one on the logo starts to rotate, and more identical symbols will appear. Depending on where the needle stops, all special symbols will expand.

With 3 Bonus symbols, a special game is activated: the grid is replaced by a wheel divided into 8 sections with 1X multipliers. Each time the wheel stops on a multiplier, it is powered up to 250X. You have 50 wheel spins available, unless the needle stops on the skull symbol, in which case the bonus game stops, and you return to the base game.

The grid has 6 reels and 6 rows and winning combinations are obtained with adjacent matching symbols. Review:
 
Cash Compass

Cash Compass is a slot game inspired by the pirates and deserted islands of the Caribbean, produced by Hacksaw Gaming. The game grid features a parchment nailed to a wooden board with symbols reminiscent of cartoon drawings. The backdrop is a crystal clear sea and lush palms.

Slot game

The game grid has 6 reels and 6 rows, where winning combinations are obtained with adjacent matching symbols. Paying lines can be formed horizontally, vertically, diagonally, and on broken lines. The minimum bet is €0.20, while the maximum is €100. The game has an excellent RTP of 96.42% and a maximum win of over 7,400 times the bet.

Game features

Cash Compass has various bonus games available. The compass symbol has a special function during one of the bonus games, where 30 or more of these symbols allow the player to win €200. The bottle symbol has the function of Scatter, which can trigger 10 free spins when at least three appear on the reels. The bonus game is activated with 3 Bonus symbols and replaces the grid with a wheel containing 8 sections with 1X multipliers, which can be powered up to 250X.

RTP and maximum win

The game has an RTP of 96.42%, which is considered good. The maximum win is over 7,400 times the bet, making it an attractive game for high rollers.

Betting options

The minimum bet for Cash Compass is €0.20, while the maximum is €100. The player can choose to activate between 10 and 1,000 automatic spins for convenience and ease of play.

Review:
 
Gameplay and Winning Combinations

Cash Compass is a 6x6 slot game with adjacent matching symbols that can be unwound in various directions. With a maximum win of over 7,400 times the bet and between 10 and 1,000 automatic spins available, players can enjoy the game for longer periods. Winning combinations begin with at least six adjacent symbols, and the minimum bet is €0.20 while the maximum is €100.

Symbol Design and Theme

Cash Compass is a pirate-themed slot game with symbols that are reminiscent of cartoon drawings. The backdrop to the game grid is the crystal clear sea and lush palms of the Caribbean islands, which adds to the overall aesthetic appeal. The symbols include playing cards J, Q, K, and A, as well as a map, a shield, a bottle, a parrot, and a compass that is the true symbol of the game.

Bonus Features and Multipliers

Cash Compass offers a range of bonus features including expanding symbols, free spins, and a special wheel game. When at least five compass symbols appear, the compass needle moves to a cardinal point and all the compasses on the grid expand in that direction. With three bonus symbols, players are taken to a special game where they can spin the wheel that has multiple multipliers. The multiplier can go up to 250X, and players have 50 spins available unless the needle stops on the skull symbol, in which case, the bonus game ends. Finally, when at least three bottle symbols appear on the grid, players can activate 10 free spins.

Betting Options and Maximum Win

Players can enjoy playing Cash Compass with a minimum bet of €0.20 and a maximum bet of €100. With a maximum win of over 7,400 times the bet, this slot game offers a range of winning opportunities.

RTP and Overall Experience

Cash Compass has an RTP of 96.42%, which is quite good. The graphics are not top-notch, but the lighter software ensures smoother gameplay. The pirate theme is interesting and the bonus features are engaging, so players are likely to have an overall enjoyable experience with Cash Compass.

faq.question: What are the symbols in Cash Compass?
faq.answer: The symbols in Cash Compass are playing cards (J, Q, K, A), map, shield, bottle, parrot, and compass. The compass is the most valuable symbol, and 30 or more of these symbols allow you to win €200.

faq.question: What is the function of the compass symbol in Cash Compass?
faq.answer: The compass symbol has a special function during one of the various bonus games available. Every time a compass appears on the reels, the one on the logo starts to rotate and more matching symbols appear. Based on where the needle stops, all special symbols will expand.

faq.question: What is the function of the bottle symbol in Cash Compass?
faq.answer: The bottle symbol has the function of Scatter and with at least 3 of them, 10 free spins are obtained. During Free Spins, every time a compass appears on the reels, the one on the logo starts to rotate and more matching symbols appear.

faq.question: How do I activate the Bonus game in Cash Compass?
faq.answer: With 3 Bonus symbols, a special game is activated: the grid is replaced by a wheel divided into 8 sections with 1X multipliers. Every time the wheel stops on a multiplier, it is powered up to 250X. You have 50 wheel spins available, unless the needle stops on the skull symbol, in which case the bonus game ends and you return to the base game.

Review: Cash Compass

Among the many slot games released recently, Cash Compass is certainly one that deserves special attention. Produced by Hacksaw Gaming, this slot is inspired by one of those stories that have fascinated people all over the world for centuries: pirates and the deserted islands of the Caribbean. It is the crystal clear sea and lush palms that form the backdrop to the game grid, here represented by a parchment nailed to a wooden board. The symbols are reminiscent of cartoon drawings and even though the graphics are not excellent, this is not a problem, in fact: the lighter the software, the smoother the game! At the top of the grid is the title of the slot, where the "o" in Compass is represented by a compass with a special function during one of the various bonus games available. At the bottom you will find the buttons to access the menu and activate automatic spins, as well as the arrows that allow you to increase or decrease your bet.

Main features
The grid has 6 reels and 6 rows and winning combinations are obtained with adjacent matching symbols. In this sense, the paying lines can be unwound horizontally, vertically, diagonally, on broken lines. The maximum win exceeds 7,400 times the bet and between 10 and 1,000 automatic spins can be activated. The minimum bet is €0.20, the maximum is €100. The RTP is quite good, at 96.42%.

Symbols and functionalities
As already mentioned, you win if at least six adjacent symbols appear. Those related to playing cards, J, Q, K and A, are the ones that pay the least: with the minimum bet they range from €0.02 for 6 symbols up to a maximum of €2 for 15 or more symbols. The map and the shield have a winning range between €0.10 and €12, the bottle and the parrot range from €0.20 min. - €26 max. and finally the compass, the true symbol of the game: 30 or more of these symbols allow you to win €200! If at least 5 compasses appear, we will see the compass on the logo progressively fill with red lines, after which the needle will move and finally stop at a cardinal point. At this point, all the compasses will expand following the direction indicated by the needle! The bottles instead have the function of Scatter and with at least 3 of them, 10 free spins are obtained. During Free Spins, every time a compass appears on the reels, the one on the logo starts to rotate and more matching symbols appear. Based on where the needle stops, all special symbols will expand.

With 3 Bonus symbols, a special game is activated: the grid is replaced by a wheel divided into 8 sections with 1X multipliers. Every time the wheel stops on a multiplier, it is powered up to 250X. You have 50 wheel spins available, unless the needle stops on the skull symbol, in which case the bonus game ends and you return to the base game.
